title: Email OTP Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using email-based OTP authentication and obtains a valid JWT session token.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Select email authentication option.
Enter a valid email address.
Trigger sending OTP to the email.
Enter the correct OTP received via email.
Submit the OTP to authenticate.
Verify user is successfully logged in and a valid JWT token is stored in session.

title: WhatsApp OTP Authentication Failure with Incorrect OTP
description: Verify that when an incorrect OTP is entered for WhatsApp-based login, the authentication fails and an appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Select WhatsApp authentication option.
Enter a valid phone number linked to WhatsApp.
Trigger sending OTP via WhatsApp.
Enter an incorrect OTP code.
Submit the OTP.
Verify authentication is rejected and a meaningful error message is displayed.

title: Task Creation with Valid Input
description: Verify a user can create a new task successfully with all required fields using multi-language inputs and the new task appears in the task list.

steps.description: Navigate to the dashboard and open 'Create Task' form.
Fill in required fields: task title, description (with multi-language characters), due date, and assign to a user.
Submit the task creation form.
Verify task is created successfully and visible in the task list with correct data.

title: Task Creation Form Validation
description: Verify that client-side validation prevents submission of task creation form when required fields are missing or invalid and error messages display in selected language.

steps.description: Open 'Create Task' form.
Attempt to submit form without filling required fields like title and assign user.
Verify form shows real-time validation errors in the user's selected language.
Input invalid data in fields (e.g., past due date).
Verify validation error is shown for invalid due date.

title: Task Status Update and Comment Addition
description: Verify user can change a task's status and add comments, and these updates are persisted and displayed correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to an existing task detail page.
Change the task status (e.g., from 'To Do' to 'In Progress').
Add a new comment to the task.
Save the changes.
Confirm that task status updates and new comment appear in the task details.

title: Project Creation with Template Utilization
description: Verify that user can create a new project using a predefined template and the project is properly initialized with template tasks and settings.

steps.description: Navigate to the project creation page.
Select a project template from the available list.
Fill in additional required project details.
Submit the project creation form.
Verify the new project is created with tasks and settings from the selected template.

title: Team Role Assignment and Permission Enforcement
description: Verify that team members can be assigned roles and that these roles restrict or authorize actions appropriately across the system.

steps.description: Navigate to team management page and select a team member.
Change the member's role to a role with restricted permissions.
Confirm role change is saved and reflected in member's permissions.
Attempt to perform an action not allowed by the assigned role (e.g., deleting a project).
Verify the action is blocked and an appropriate access denied message is shown.

title: WhatsApp Notification Delivery and Rate Limit Handling
description: Verify that WhatsApp notifications are sent correctly for task updates and system respects rate limits by queuing or retrying as needed.

steps.description: Trigger an event that sends a WhatsApp notification (e.g., task assigned).
Verify the notification is delivered to the recipient's WhatsApp.
Simulate exceeding WhatsApp API rate limits.
Verify the system handles the rate limit by retrying or queueing notifications without message loss.

title: Analytics Dashboard Data Accuracy and Visualization Rendering
description: Verify that the analytics dashboard displays accurate real-time metrics for tasks, projects, and team performance with all charts rendering correctly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the analytics dashboard.
Verify all expected data metrics (task counts, project statuses, team activity) are present and match backend data.
Confirm all charts and visualizations render properly with no errors or distortions.

title: Routing and Protected Routes Enforcement
description: Verify that navigation handles protected routes and deep linking correctly restricting unauthorized users and maintaining smooth navigation.

steps.description: Attempt to navigate directly to a protected route URL as an unauthenticated user.
Verify the user is redirected to login page before accessing the protected route.
Login and navigate through various pages to test correct routing and protected route access.
Confirm navigation is smooth, URLs update correctly, and protected routes are accessible only after authentication.

title: Client-Side Form Multi-Language Validation and Error Feedback
description: Verify that all forms provide instant validation and error feedback in multiple supported languages.

steps.description: Set user interface language to a non-default supported language.
Open any input form (e.g., task creation).
Leave required fields empty or enter invalid data and attempt to submit.
Validate that error messages appear dynamically and are displayed in the selected language.

title: Reusable UI Components Accessibility Compliance
description: Verify that UI components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS meet accessibility standards including ARIA roles, keyboard navigation, and screen reader support.

steps.description: Navigate through UI components using keyboard only.
Confirm focus indicators are visible, tab order is logical, and all interactive components are reachable.
Use a screen reader to verify correct ARIA labels and descriptions are announced.

title: API Error Handling and Retry Logic
description: Verify that API client retries on transient errors and properly surfaces consistent error messages on permanent failures.

steps.description: Simulate API transient error (e.g., network timeout) during a task fetch.
Verify the API client retries the request according to configured logic.
Simulate a permanent API error (e.g., 400 Bad Request) when creating a project.
Check the system displays a clear and consistent error message to the user.

title: Responsive UI Layout Adaptation Across Devices
description: Verify that the application UI adapts correctly to desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes ensuring usability and no visual regressions.

steps.description: Open the application in desktop browser and verify layout and UI components.
Confirm UI elements render properly and are fully accessible.
Resize viewport to tablet dimensions and verify responsive UI adjustments.
Confirm navigation, forms, and components adapt correctly.
Resize viewport to mobile dimensions or use a mobile device to access the app.
Verify that UI remains usable, components stack appropriately, and navigation remains functional.

title: Real-time Notification and Toast Message Display
description: Verify that system-triggered real-time toast notifications appear correctly for success, warnings, and error states during task and project operations.

steps.description: Perform an action such as task creation or project update.
Verify a success toast notification appears promptly and disappears after a reasonable timeout.
Trigger an error condition (e.g., invalid input).
Confirm an error toast message is displayed with accurate information.
